summary:
20 years' experience in the Recruitment Industry specialising in supporting the sales function with: 
•	Legal & Compliance
•	AWR 
•	IR35 
•	GDPR
•	HR & internal recruitment

I have experience of both Public and Private Sector client requirements and love the fact that even after all these years I am still learning. The pandemic changed the landscape of talent acquisition in so many ways and it also led to a big career change for me. 4M is a team of professionals who are committed to embracing the future of the industry. We have worked together for many years and our vision and motivation will enhance not only our own futures but those of clients and candidates we partner with. 

I also have 10 years of mentoring students within local schools - I'm currently the Enterprise Advisor for The Kimberley School in Nottingham in conjunction with Futures. As a working mother it's always been a priority for me to support and offer guidance on the world of work to students and young adults.  It's immensely satisfying to have conversations that could ultimately change someone's life.
headline: Operations Director / Recruitment Compliance Professional at 4M / Volunteer student mentor and support for local schools with career strategy / long time dog rescuer

experience.description:
20 years' experience in the Recruitment Industry specialising in supporting the sales function with: 
• Legal & Compliance
• AWR 
• IR35 
• GDPR
• HR & internal recruitment

I have experience of both Public and Private Sector client requirements and love the fact that even after all these years I am still learning. The pandemic changed the landscape of talent acquisition in so many ways and it also led to a big career change for me. NxGen Recruit Limited is a team of professionals who are committed to embracing the future of the industry. We have worked together for many years and our vision and motivation will enhance not only our own futures but those of clients and candidates we partner with. 

I have been mentoring students and supporting Career Leaders within local schools for almost a decade - I'm currently the Enterprise Advisor for The Kimberley School in Nottingham in conjunction with Futures. As a working mother it's always been a priority for me to support and offer guidance on the world of work to students and young adults. It's immensely satisfying to have conversations that could ultimately change someone's life.
experience.title: Operations Director

experience.description:
Recruitment compliance professional with 18 years of experience implementing regulatory requirements including AWR, IR35, GDPR etc.

Enterprise Adviser to various schools in the Nottingham area for many years - mentoring and assisting with careers strategy. Providing that bridge between students and the world of work.

Author of regular career advice column in NG magazine.
experience.title: Manager

experience.description:
Purchasing of Uniforms for Own Brand Beauty Consutants in all UK stores.

Organising Consultant of the Year Competition held at various prestigious venues including the Dorchester Hotel, London. Raising press and industry awareness of the event.

Managing multi million pound temporary staffing budget and liaising with external Beauty suppliers to ensure optimum store cover especially at peak periods.

Working with Store Planning Team to ensure correct staffing levels after store refits/refurbishments.


Took a career break in 1993 to raise my children.
experience.title: Marketing Manager

experience.description:
Responsible for Own Brand cosmetic sales in  Boots Stores in the South East. Targeting Consultants instore and working with store management to increase sales and productivity.
Conducted training courses at area level to intermediate level.
experience.title: Area Manager No7 and 17 Brands

experience.description:
Responsible for advertising revenue within the magazine with all UK based clients.
My team also organised two large overseas property exhibitions at the Cumberland Hotel W1 each year.
experience.title: UK Sales Manager

volunteer.description:
I am an approved homechecker for numerous Dog Rescue organisations throughout the UK. I can be called upon at short notice to visit potential adopters in their homes to assess suitability for rehoming dogs in need.
When discussing large breeds it's imperative that adopters understand the commitment and breed traits that will ultimately make the match successful.
As a volunteer I made myself available to transport dogs to the safety of foster homes in the Nottinghamshire area when the need arose.

Bringing commercial knowledge to the table to assist local schools with careers strategy and implementation. 
Aspiring to help bridge the gap between schools and the world of work.
